articles.description: opBNB Mainnet Live opBNB mainnet is now open to the public. opBNB is an EVM-compatible L2 built on the Optimism OP Stack. There are now over 150 projects building on opBnB. Comsos V12 Live Cosmos has completed the â€œGaia V12â€ upgrade. The upgrade introduces the liquid staking module (LSM), allowing for ATOM staked with validators to convert into liquid-staked ATOM.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - opBNB Mainnet Live, Cosmos V12 Live, Cross-chain Farming, and More...
